item.title: Automatic Star Rating for Movie Reviews - Part 1
item.description: One of my favorite hobbies in the world is watching movies. Usually, if I stay one week without watching a new movie I feel that something is wrong, After watching a movie, I almost read reviews from different critics on the Internet, to look into different opinions about the movie I just saw or just to learn something new about movie in general. Most of the critics that I read rate their movies using the “star” rating, where a movie get a rate ranging from one to five stars.
